overview: A maladjusted L.A. man named Henry Pinkle becomes suicidal when his favorite sitcom is cancelled. His plan to kill himself is thwarted by the mysterious Sam Bones, who promises to make Henry a star with the aid of a baby mask and hatchet.
tagline: A SERIAL KILLER STALKS HOLLYWOOD ...AND HE WANT'S TO BE A STAR
title: Star Time
